enabled.description: Allowlist. If set, only these run.
enabled.title: Enabled

BuildV2Request.description: Build V2: UI sends a full spec (no need for copilot_spec.yaml).
BuildV2Request.title: BuildV2Request

description.default: Example Spark pipeline generated by Copilot
description.title: Description

artifact_path.description: Local filesystem path to release tar.gz
artifact_path.title: Artifact Path

require_packaging_manifest.description: If false, only sha256 is verified (legacy)
require_packaging_manifest.title: Require Packaging Manifest

strict_no_extras.description: If true, fail when tar contains extra files not listed in manifest
strict_no_extras.title: Strict No Extras

get.description:
Returns a recommended Spark executor configuration based on
data size, join complexity, and SLA constraints.

parameters.description: Estimated input data size in GB
parameters.name: data_gb

schema.description: Estimated input data size in GB
schema.title: Data Gb

parameters.description: Number of join operations in the job
parameters.name: joins

schema.description: Number of join operations in the job
schema.title: Joins

parameters.description: SLA deadline in minutes (used to enable speculation for tight SLAs)
parameters.name: sla_minutes

schema.description: SLA deadline in minutes (used to enable speculation for tight SLAs)
schema.title: Sla Minutes
Response Get Spark Config Recommendation Advisors Spark Config Get

get.description:
Readiness reflects ability to serve traffic.
In non-prod environments, skip strict secret validation.

post.description: Attach upstream remote + persist config (per workspace job).

get.description:
direction:
  - upstream_to_workspace: git diff upstream_ref..HEAD
  - workspace_to_upstream: git diff HEAD..upstream_ref
paths:
  - comma-separated scope prefixes, e.g. jobs,dags,configs
  - .copilot is always excluded

parameters.description: Comma-separated path prefixes to include
parameters.name: paths

schema.description: Comma-separated path prefixes to include
schema.title: Paths

post.description: Fetch upstream refs based on saved upstream.json.

get.description: Show ahead/behind vs upstream branch + file drift summary.

parameters.description: Comma-separated path prefixes to include (e.g., app,ui,copilot_spec.yaml)
parameters.name: paths

schema.description: Comma-separated path prefixes to include (e.g., app,ui,copilot_spec.yaml)
schema.title: Paths

post.description:
Upstream switching modes:
  - replace: update upstream remote/branch (baseline unchanged)
  - rebaseline: replace + set baseline to current HEAD
  - reset: replace + hard reset workspace to upstream ref + baseline = new HEAD (destructive)

parameters.description: Optional if .copilot/upstream.json already exists
parameters.name: repo_url

schema.description: Optional if .copilot/upstream.json already exists
schema.title: Repo Url

parameters.description: Optional if .copilot/upstream.json already exists
parameters.name: branch

schema.description: Optional if .copilot/upstream.json already exists
schema.title: Branch

parameters.description: Optional if .copilot/upstream.json already exists
parameters.name: remote

schema.description: Optional if .copilot/upstream.json already exists
schema.title: Remote

parameters.description: replace|rebaseline|reset
parameters.name: mode

schema.description: replace|rebaseline|reset
schema.title: Mode

parameters.description: Only used for reset mode to allow dirty repos
parameters.name: force

schema.description: Only used for reset mode to allow dirty repos
schema.title: Force

parameters.description: Only used for reset mode; runs git clean -fd after reset
parameters.name: clean_untracked

schema.description: Only used for reset mode; runs git clean -fd after reset
schema.title: Clean Untracked

post.description:
Canonical apply endpoint: /sync/apply (router prefix already includes /sync).
Phase 21 guardrails:
  - block dirty workspace
  - optional baseline commit validation (if provided)

schema.title: Response Sync Apply Api V1 Sync Apply Post
Response Sync Plan Api V1 Sync Plan Post
Response Get Plan Api V1 Sync Plan  Plan Id  Get
Response Simulate Rebase Api V1 Sync Rebase Simulate Post
